queryDetail.queryDescription: Rule to notify hardware components that are offline on commvault hyperscale appliances
queryDetail.sqlQuery:
create table #tbl_HWDetailForAlert( NodeId int, NodeName nvarchar(510), EntityType int, EntityId int, EntityName varchar(256), EntityInfo varchar(256), EntityStatus int, EntityStatusStr varchar(16) )
insert into #tbl_HWDetailForAlert exec MMGetScaleOutHwInfoForHwEntity 1,31,1
select NodeName, EntityName, EntityStatusStr from #tbl_HWDetailForAlert where EntityStatus = 0
drop table #tbl_HWDetailForAlert
